data.title: Bakersfield Women's Soccer Announces 2024 Promotional Schedule
authors: California State University at Bakersfield Athletics
data.meta_description: Cal State Bakersfield Women's Soccer announces their 2024 promotional schedule.
data.meta_site_name: California State University at Bakersfield Athletics
data.text:
2024 Cal State Bakersfield Women's Soccer Schedule

Bakersfield, Calif. - Cal State Bakersfield's marketing department is proud to announce the promotions and themes for its women's soccer home matches at the Main Soccer Field this season. Highlights include the Rowdy Run, Senior Day and International Night!

Kicking off the Roadrunner 2024 home schedule is the Blue vs. White scrimmage on Saturday, Aug. 3rd. CSUB is excited to host 10 home games throughout the season, with Senior Night set for Thursday, Sept. 19 against Nevada. Click here for the full season schedule.

For more information regarding ticket offers and promotions contact the CSUB Athletics Ticket Office at (661) 654-BLUE or GOLD, tickets@csub.edu, or visit gorunners.com/tickets.

Stay up to date with Cal State Bakersfield Athletics by following us on Twitter and Instagram.

2024 Season-Long Promotions:

Group Discount:

All group orders for 10+ tickets will receive a special discounted rate of $7 per ticket. Click here to view our informational / FAQ webpage about groups outings and here for information on all our group fan experience opportunities!

Season Tickets:

Purchase your season tickets for all 10 home games for just $75! Click here to purchase now. Season ticket plans prorate as games are played, resulting in a lower price.

Youth Season Tickets:

A special season ticket discount is available for all youth (3-17). Pricing starts at $50 per individual for Women's Soccer but prorates as games are played.

Veteran of the Game:

Nominate a "Veteran of the Game" to be recognized for their service at each one of our women's soccer home games! Five complimentary tickets will be provided for a veteran and their guests! Fill out the following link to nominate now: gorunners.com/NominateAVeteran

Gameday Poster:

Be sure to stop by the marketing table near the southside entrance of the field to pick up a free Roadrunner women's soccer gameday poster. Collect all game day posters! Different athletes will be highlighted each match.

Youth Opportunity:

Ball Kids: Must be 10-14 years old. All ball kids must be part of a paid group outing and be able to commit to the full game.

2024 Single-Match Promotions (subject to change):

Thursday - August 8 vs Trinity Western @ 6:00 PM | GET TICKETS

Club Day

All youth soccer clubs will receive free admission into the game!

Sunday – August 25 vs Weber State @ 12:00 PM | GET TICKETS

Season Opener/Back-to-School Game

Join us for the Roadrunner's season home opener! We welcome all students and their families to the beautiful campus of Bakersfield. Enjoy the game with some ice cream! The first 50 fans will receive free ice cream.

Thursday – September 12 vs LMU @ 7:00 PM | GET TICKETS

Rowdy Run

Come join us for our 12th Annual Rowdy Run where we get to welcome first year CSUB students to participate in a ceremonial run during halftime!

Thursday – September 19 vs Nevada @ 7:00 PM | GET TICKETS

Senior Night

Join us as we honor and celebrate the senior class for their contributions to the program with a pre-match ceremony.

Thursday – October 3 vs UC San Diego @ 7:00 PM | GET TICKETS

Big West Opener

Come cheer on the Roadrunners as we host UCSD for the Big West home opener! Calling all students! The first 100 CSUB students will receive a free chick-fil-a sandwich courtesy of Chick-Fil-A located on Stockdale Hwy. and California Ave.

Thursday – October 24 vs UC CSUN @ 7:00 PM | GET TICKETS

International Night
